ResourceHeader.ResourceName: VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna at Kevo, Finland
ResourceHeader.Description: A VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna (Create Design, HR130C) operated since _________________. It has 10turn with 5-m height. 100kHz sampling and its sensitivity peak is at 8kHz. ch.1: VLF-NS, ch.2: VLF-EW, ch.3: riometer, ch.4: GPS 1pps. ch.1 (VLF-NS): E-W antenna measuring NS magnetic field variation; ch.2 (VLF-EW): N-S antenna measuring EW magnetic field variation.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of this observation, Prof. Shiokawa before using the data.
